title: Biden postpones Italy trip amid raging Los Angeles fires

description: The Senate Judiciary Committee has set a hearing date for President-elect Trump’s Attorney General pick Pam Bondi. The hearing will take place on Jan. 15 and 16, giving Senators on the panel the chance to question Bondi before voting on her nomination. Trump chose Bondi, Florida’s former attorney general, as his second nominee to lead...
title: Judiciary panel sets hearing date for Trump AG nominee

description: Biden and Harris campaign battleground director Dan Kanninen said Wednesday that President Biden being on the presidential ticket wouldn’t have changed the outcome of the 2024 election. “I think that if he was the top of the ticket, versus Kamala Harris, who did an excellent job performing over 107 days, I don't see how that...
title: Battleground director says Biden being on ticket wouldn't have changed outcome

description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) is doubling down on his attacks against tech billionaire Elon Musk over H-1B visas, telling him he’s “dead wrong” about the employment visa. In an op-ed published Wednesday on Fox News, Sanders highlighted the ongoing debate about H-1B visas and other guest worker programs as President-elect Trump prepares to implement his...
title: Sanders doubles down on attacks on Musk over H-1B visas: ‘Dead wrong’

description: President-elect Trump and Republican senators wrestled over the best strategy for moving Trump’s top agenda items, including border security and tax relief, during a two-hour meeting at the Capitol Wednesday night, but Trump largely resisted senators’ pleas to break his agenda up into two big bills. Many Republican senators, including Senate Majority Leader John Thune...
title: Trump, GOP senators wrestle over strategy for president-elect's agenda

title: Anxieties jump at Trump's Greenland, Panama Canal military talk

description: President-elect Trump on Wednesday said “it doesn’t matter” whether Republicans on Capitol Hill tackle his top priorities on taxes, energy and the border in one package or two as the party tries to nail down its plan for the coming months.  “We had a great meeting. There’s great unity. Whether it’s one bill or two...
title: Trump says it 'doesn’t matter' how GOP passes his agenda: 'The end result is the same’

description: California Rep. Ami Bera (D) said the fires raging across parts of Los Angeles could be the state’s worst disaster in history. Bera joined NewsNation’s "The Hill" on Wednesday to discuss the ongoing fire and the briefing the California delegation received from the Office of Emergency Services. “It’s horrific and tragic and our hearts go...
title: California rep warns Los Angeles fires could be 'worst disaster in California's history'

description: Dockworkers and longshoremen struck a tentative deal Wednesday night to avoid a damaging strike ahead of a looming January deadline.  “This is a win-win agreement that creates ILA jobs, supports American consumers and businesses, and keeps the American economy the key hub of the global marketplace,” the International Longshoremen's Association (ILA) and United States Maritime...
title: Dockworkers reach tentative deal to avert damaging strike

description: Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito on Wednesday confirmed a call with President-elect Trump, and he said they did not discuss an emergency application from Trump to block his upcoming sentencing in his New York hush money case. “William Levi, one of my former law clerks, asked me to take a call from President-elect Trump regarding...
title: Alito confirms call with Trump, says emergency order not discussed

description: Rep. Brandon Gill (R-Texas) says Canada, Panama and Greenland should be "honored" by President-elect Trump's ambitions to make them part of the United States. title: Lawmaker lauds Trump's expansion plan: Panama, Greenland, Canada 'should be honored’
